category: 22: Utilities / 2211: Electric Power Generation, Transmission and Distribution
description: Electricity generation mixes by country, as sourced from Ember Climate, are linked to U.S. based generators and supply chains. These data represent a generation mix and do not account for transmission loss to end users.

name: Electricity; at grid; generation mix - France

processDocumentation.completenessDescription: This process contains no elementary flows. Generation mix of all technologies sums to 100%.
processDocumentation.dataCollectionDescription: Data from Ember Climate were accessed on October 17 2025.
processDocumentation.dataSelectionDescription: Data were retrieved for all available countries for the most recent data year.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Generation by fuel subcateogry were normalized to total generation for each country to generate resource shares.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: This process represents the generation mix of the entire region.
processDocumentation.intendedApplication: This process is intended for use with electricity flows from the U.S. Electricity Baseline.
processDocumentation.inventoryMethodDescription: Not applicable; this process contains only technosphere flows.
processDocumentation.modelingConstantsDescription: Approaches to compile and estimate generation mixes for specific countries by Ember Climate are described in the linked Ember Climate Data Methodology source object.
processDocumentation.projectDescription: This dataset was developed by the Federal LCA Commons Data Curator Eastern Research Group, Inc. (ERG) under subcontract (SUB-2024-10066) to the National Renewable Energy Laboratory under Department of Energy (DOE) Prime Contract No. DE-AC36-08GO28308. The work is funded by DOE's Advanced Materials & Manufacturing Technologies Office (AMMTO).

reviews.details: details of review performed go here

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Generation technologies were mapped to those available in the U.S. Electricity Baseline.
processDocumentation.timeDescription: This process reflects the generation mix of the region over the course of the entire year. It reflects the most recently available full year.
processDocumentation.useAdvice: This process is intended to connect to electriciy generation processes from the electricity baseline.
